jd: Dear Techno Functional BA, Vertex Elite is looking for Techno Functional BA. Please share your profile, if you are looking for a job. Job Location: New York, NY Work Authorization: USC/GC/GC-EAD/H4-EAD/L2EAD/H1B Required Skills: Demonstrable experience within the listed derivatives markets with a strong understanding of trading and clearing workflows. Hands-on support experience within a financial institution (buy-side, sell-side, venue/platform provider). Strong working knowledge of Fidessa GTP or equivalent systems (No Development exp needed). Demonstrable working knowledge of the FIX protocol. Application support experience within a Unix / Linux environment. Familiarity of MSSQL, Oracle or Sybase database environments, including query-writing.
